ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:11:31 [Issue ID 4000-219356] urn:comicvine:4000-219356 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 16:36:40. [Issue ID 131724]
ComicInfo.Summary: Evil forces have gathered in secret within the corridors of the Vatican itself in an attempt to destroy the two most powerful arms of the Church's defense, the Magic Priests and the Warrior Nuns. Ancient enemies of these two orders have allied themselves in order to crush them and satisfy the lust for revenge that has consumed their dark souls for centuries. Fortunately for the Church, Areala is aware of this sinister plot and rushes to the Vatican to try and save everything she holds sacred from annihilation. Will she arrive in time, and will she survive the wrath of this dark alliance?
ComicInfo.Tags: Lillith the Demon Princess,Mother Superion,Warrior Nun Areala,Father Sebastian Crowe,Shotgun Mary,Cardinal Stark
ComicInfo.Title: The Angel and the Coming Storm Part 1 "God's Own Descent"
